title: How long is Jax gonna be allowed to be this opressive?
body: There's literally no counter to him and his fucking E. Such an unfun champ to play against. Far worse than Yasuo

replies.body: I don't see him as being too oppressive, but to answer your question- as long as conqueror exists.

Seriously who isn't opressive in this season now? Thanks to all the extra damage from runes, buffed ignite, lower resistances (for mages especially) the snowball starts with one kill and xp lead and it is almost impossible to turn it around or outscale (unless low elo where players don't know how to end).

I agree Jax is currently one of the strongest champions as he has good damage, survivalability and can deal well with assassins who are played now in almost every lane now. But this all is indirect issue and the problem lies in new runes and nerfs and buffs not in champions.

> is currently one of the strongest champions as he has good damage, survivalability and can deal well with assassins

I dont find that broken, What makes his E broken is hes not hindered by it. 

Shen has his W that blocks auto attacks, and can auto during it. 

What makes it really broken, is that 
1.you are rewarded for autoing once, and then agro the creep way so that your E damage is increase, 
2. You can perform every action without it affecting your E and Vise-versa 
3. has a 25 Dmg reduction from area of effect abilities. 
4. its on a 16/14/12/10/8 Cd while shen's is on a 18/16.5/15/13.5 /12 (however its pretty unfair to compare the abilites. but I feel like jaxes is really over loaded for a cd like that; Also the Dodge lasts longer on jax)
5. And after all that, there is a stun at the end. 
(also its not a channel and cant be interrupted) 

I find it completely overloaded. LIke why does he need the 25% dmg reduction and, why does it do more damage because of the creeps?

I disagree with you, if he wasn't able to AA you during his E, a Jax player would need to think about when and how to use it.

He would have to time it in order to negate maybe a Trinity proc, an AA reset, or an AA buffer. Now he just needs to jump on you whenever is off cooldown. If you're playing an AA reliant champion, your only option is to run, you cannot even wait his E to go out and sidestep the stun, because chances are he's going to kill you before that.

What I'm saying here is that, if he couldn't AA while channeling his E, he would be easier to balance.

You mentioned Shen, but his skill have requirements that Shen is balanced around, the W is cast around his Passive, so you can't walk wherever you want with it, that means your enemies can choose to move away from your W and you can either stay on you W to avoid damage or chase and lose the W.

And I would disagree. What you you say came to happen, It would become the most out of place ability. 
-His passive relies on auto attacking stacking. (Passive)
-you got one ability that applies on hit When Hit (Q)
-another that enhances his Auto, (W)
-and his ults passive gives him on hit dmg (R)
 
... and you want him to stop autoing. During his E. 

Personally, I dont think that would help that champion. It would just delete him. 
His Kit theme is Auto attacking. Becomes the auto king, By autoing, while dodging autos. 

I see you want that ability be turned more into a Defensive ability. meaning he'd need to build tank, but lets face it. every tank has a much better kit than he does when it comes to tanking.

I'll purpose a bunch of nerfs purpose a nerf that effects the way his ability works. 

1) Like making his E into a sort of **channel**(Currently his E isnt a channel) so stuns, knockups, silences would make him drop his E if he misuses it. 
(However doing so would kill him of any chance for team fighting)

2) Making is so that his E doesn't increase in damage when Minions attack him reducing his trading game more fair. (and have it so that it that damage increases from jung creeps so he can jungle with it. 
(However doing this, would only make him hurt his early game, and only would still become a moster IF He does reach to late.)

3) When his E is up, he drops his 'guard' making Abilities deal bonus damage to him.
(you can compensate for this nerf, by increasing the damage he takes into damage he deals.)

4)Or We can look at his mobility. 
(Eamples: 
:Disable his Q when you are in the State of E (I'd say let him have the Flash E tho)
:Blitz crank it, And Reduce his movement speed while hes in the state of his E. 

5) Numbers. 
Easy stuff, Increase the CD, Increase the mana cost, Reduce the scaling, reduce the stun radius

Good one man hahaha

> "Just control minion wave against the character that free pushes without consequence"

Champions who are forced to constantly pushed have the inherit weakness of needing to constantly push. It means they're always in range for abilities and always have the longest trip back into safety. Most of all, it is harder for them to freeze and manage the wave (because they are too busy clearing, see: Kayle).

Yes, but remember that MOST (4/5 players), are NOT laning against Jax. They are dealing with him 15/20+ min into the game when he usually has Tiamat and probably trinity. At that point, realistically, you cannot stop him from AFK shoving. 

Best case scenario you chunk him for like 15% of his health, worst case he jumps on you and kills you.
Yes, you can play around him. You have abilities too.
